overview: Think there weren't a bevy of Asian hotties in 70's porn?  How about the slim-and-stacked drop-dead gorgeous Mei Ling? Petite and perky-titted Linda Wong? And who could forget the wild fuckdoll Mai Lin? They, along with other more unknown beauties, are here in this buffet of fucky-sucky, in rare film scenes and loops from Diverse, Superstar Ladies, Shanghai Girls and Diamond. Ten fantastic segments in all. So get some Asian flashback porn today!
title: Asian Sluts in the 70's
